statements: SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT mutation_name, chromosome, position FROM mutations WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name FROM mutations WHERE position >= 1000 AND position <= 2000;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE chromosome = 'Y';
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mutations GROUP BY gene_name HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT mutation_name, gene_name, chromosome, position FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_name FROM mutations WHERE chromosome = '3' ORDER BY mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, chromosome, position FROM mutations WHERE mutation_name LIKE '%del%' ORDER BY mutation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Mutation;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM Mutation;
SELECT chromosome, gene_name, mutation_type FROM Mutation;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalData;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_id FROM ClinicalData;
SELECT * FROM Mutation WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM Mutation WHERE chromosome = '1';
SELECT mutation_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ClinicalData GROUP BY mutation_id HAVING count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM Mutation;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalData JOIN Mutation ON ClinicalData.mutation_id = Mutation.mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_mutations;
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM genetic_mutations;
SELECT * FROM clinical_data;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, diagnosis FROM clinical_data;
SELECT mutation_id, patient_id FROM mutation_clinical_data;
SELECT * FROM genetic_mutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM genetic_mutations WHERE mutation_position > 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM clinical_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, chromosome_number FROM genetic_mutations JOIN mutation_clinical_data ON genetic_mutations.mutation_id = mutation_clinical_data.mutation_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM clinical_data JOIN mutation_clinical_data ON clinical_data.patient_id = mutation_clinical_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, mutation_effect FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, mutation_position FROM mutations WHERE mutation_effect LIKE '%harmful%';
SELECT * FROM clinical_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, country FROM patients WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, count(*) AS mutation_count FROM mutations GROUP BY gene_name ORDER BY mutation_count DESC;

SELECT mutations.*, clinical_data.*, patients.patient_name FROM mutations JOIN clinical_data ON mutations.clinical_data_id = clinical_data.clinical_data_id JOIN patients ON clinical_data.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, mutations.mutation_effect FROM studies JOIN mutations ON studies.mutation_id = mutations.mutation_id ORDER BY study_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 50 ORDER BY diagnosis, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM mutations
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients
SELECT * FROM clinical_data WHERE diagnosis='Cancer'
SELECT mutation_type, effect_on_gene FROM mutations
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution';
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number, start_position, end_position FROM genes WHERE chromosome_number IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT patient_name, clinical_notes, diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN clinical_data ON patients.patient_id = clinical_data.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';

SELECT mutation_id, gene_id, mutation_type, effect_on_gene FROM mutations INNER JOIN mutations_patients ON mutations.mutation_id = mutations_patients.mutation_id WHERE mutation_status = 'Detected' ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
